questions.question: So I guess the question that I want to ask also is like, how speculative is psychology?
You know, what happened to Americans that their approval of President Bush got so high so fast?
I guess the question is what do I say to people that there's something to really think about here?
Well, I guess another question to ask around this, like what does the world look like without religion?
What's your view, not to make me the interviewer, but what's your view about machine ethics?
So what three books, technical or fiction or philosophical had a big impact in your life and you would recommend?
One is, you know, one of your questions, I think, was, you know, what's the meaning of life?
